lead_paragraph: This Cameron Labine film features mismatched siblings and a road trip gone wrong.
snippet: This Cameron Labine film features mismatched siblings and a road trip gone wrong.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Mountain Men,’ Two Brothers Are Forced to Work Things Out

abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews movie Mountain Men, written and directed by Cameron Labine.
